title: Question
description: A collection of questions with step-by-step and solutions

attempts.description: A log of all attempts for this question.

datetime.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of the attempt.

code.description: A code representing the outcome or type of attempt (e.g., 'needed help','from memory').

DSLA.description: Days Since Last Attempt. The number of days that have passed since the most recent attempt on the question.

LaMI.description: Latest Memory Interval. The number of days between the most recent memory-based attempt and the previous attempt.

PMG-D.description: Potential Memory Gain (Days). The estimated improvement in the Latest Memory Interval, in days, if the next attempt is successful.

PMG-X.description: Potential Memory Gain Multiplier. How much the Latest Memory Interval will increase if the next attempt is successful. Calculated by dividing the PMG-D by LaMI

total_attempts.description: The total number of attempts made for a question.

memory_attempts.description: The number of attempts completed solely from memory.

help_attempts.description: The number of attempts where external help or references were used.

attempts_summary.description: A three-part summary, separated by semicolons (e.g., `4; 1; 3`), that details your attempts for a question. Components: total_attempts (First Number), memory_attempts (Second Number), help_attempts (Third Number)

PMG-X_cell_color.description: A hex color code representing the question's priority.
